servicePlan.title: 4G Supreme Service plan
servicePlan.desc: Maximum local data transmission speed at 21Mbps, 3,000 minutes of local voice calls

servicePlan.title: 4G Anytime+ Service plan
servicePlan.desc: Port-in users enjoy 5GB data usage, up to 21Mbps, 128kbps thereafter, 3,000 minutes of local voice calls

servicePlan.title: 4G Anytime Service plan
servicePlan.desc: Up to 384kbps for the first 2GB, 128kbps thereafter, 2,000 minutes of local voice calls

servicePlan.title: 4G Easy Connect Service plans
servicePlan.desc: Features 3 options: 1GB/3GB/6GB, Port-in users entitled to an extra 1GB per month, Up to 42Mbps

servicePlan.title: Local Voice Plan 300mins/Month
servicePlan.desc: 300 minutes of local voice calls,  $0.2/minute thereafter

servicePlan.title: Local Voice Plan 1200mins/Month
servicePlan.desc: 1,200 minutes of local voice calls, $0.2/minute thereafter

servicePlan.title: Local Voice Plan 2300mins/Month
